name: KOWAI-Japanese Haunting Photos
description:
Can you play this until the end?
Brace yourself for the most horrifying paranormal experience...
〜Kowai - Japanese Haunting Photos〜

Find ghosts from over 100 photos...
Now, let’s take a look at it, shall we...?
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
▼How to play▼
⑴Observe the photograph
⑵Look for anything that strikes odd
⑶Tap on it
▼Recommended scenes...▼
・When you want to get close with your significant other with some scary app
・When you want to experience something horrifying to forget about your loneliness
・When you’re bored at night and you want to play something scary even though you know you’ll regret it
・When you want some game to play with your buddies
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Don’t look behind you after you’re done playing...
You wouldn’t want to see “it”...
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

※This app is intended for entertainment purpose only and the ghosts in the photos are all edited in.
